alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Harding County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 9:52AM MST until January 01 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph may reduce visibilities in blowing snow. * WHERE...Eastern San Miguel County, Harding County and Union County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to Noon MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Harding County; Union County
